treatment-md.title: Pseudotomentella sciastra Svantesson, Larsson, Koljalg, May, Cangren, Nilsson & Larsson, 2019, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Solving the taxonomic identity of Pseudotomentellatristis s. l. (Thelephorales, Basidiomycota) - a multi-gene phylogeny and taxonomic review, integrating ecological and geographical data
